system.name: Example GenAI Assistant
system.notes: Sample dossier for demonstrating NIST AI 600-1 flavored coverage checks.

genai_profile.DATA_PROVENANCE_SUMMARY: High-level provenance summary: data types, licensing posture, exclusions, and known gaps.
genai_profile.ADAPTATION_FINETUNING_NOTES: Fine-tuning notes: method, objectives, and post-training alignment at a high level.
genai_profile.EVALUATION_EVIDENCE: Red-team summary + robustness checks documented at https://example.org/redteam-report . DOI example: 10.5555/12345678 . Known failure modes and uncertainty are recorded.
genai_profile.MISUSE_MONITORING: Misuse monitoring covers prompt injection/jailbreaks, data exfiltration/secret leakage, policy evasion/guardrail bypass, harassment/toxicity, and model inversion/membership inference. Includes escalation pathway + rate limiting.
genai_profile.DISCLOSURE: User-facing disclosure of AI involvement, limitations/uncertainty, and a reporting channel for harms.
